EXTRA_TEXT: A construct of the Spire, programmed to defend it. NL Able to defend itself from harm on command.
One of the Guardian's earlier drafts. NL It worked better on paper.
This unusual slime loves to eat tasty relics. NL It serves the Heart completely by accident.
Is this... the Slime Boss? It seems awfully friendly. NL Well, its hat is surely the largest in the Spire, so it must be in charge...
An accursed spirit of the Spire. NL Sealed to an eternal fate as a protector.
Likes to chase yellow circles around on its days off. NL Has a crippling fear of power pellets.
Hexaghost's old partner. NL Decided to stop slaying adventurers for a more stable job selling wishes.
It uses its eyes to induce cognitive deviation, disguising its true form. NL Studies show that confused creatures see a completely different world.
Seeking greater strength, this ambitious Snecko followed in the footsteps of its hero. NL Adopting many consummate V's and a beefy arm, it calls itself "Sneckdor".
Her sword looks impossible for her to wield, NL but she's actually the only one strong enough to lift it.
Yep! Tip to toe, that's the Automaton, alright! NL I've never seen anything that looks more like the Automaton!
